summary: Phish is an American rock band from Burlington, Vermont, known for their live improvisations and dedicated fan base. Formed in 1983, the band consists of Trey Anastasio (guitar), Mike Gordon (bass), Jon Fishman (drums), and Page McConnell (keyboards), all of whom sing. They gained popularity in the 1990s and have blended various music genres. Phish has taken breaks but reunited in 2008, continuing to perform and release music on their own label, JEMP Records.
title: Phish
